attributes.action: except and support decisions taken by British Courts, in particular the warrant issued for the arrest of former Israeli defence Minister Tzipi Livni for War Crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A warrant was issued by British Courts on Saturday for the arrest of Former Israeli Defence Minister Tzipi Livni for War Crimes committed during the 3 week Attack on the Gaza strip this time last year. Although the warrant has now been with retracted, following this whole event our government has been rebuked and threatened by the Israeli Government into a frenzied attemp to bend British Laws to "protect" Israel from the rule of Law. This is unacceptable.
We support the Courts decision to make criminals such as Tzipi Livni accountable for their actions, which in her case directly resulted in the indiscriminate killing babies, children, men and women alike. She should be held accountable.
Our goverment must support the action taken by the courts and demand that Israel reapect it.
